comments: Molien series of 2-dimensional representation of group of order 16 over GF(3).
references: D. J. Benson, Polynomial Invariants of Finite Groups, Cambridge, 1993, p. 107.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,1,-1).
formula: From _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 05 2005: (Start)a(n) = floor(n/4) + ((n mod 2 + 1 - floor((n mod 4)/3)) mod 2).a(n) = A110654(A028242(n)).(End)a(n) = (3 + 3*(-1)^n + (1-i)*(-i)^n + (1+i)*i^n + 2*n) / 8 where i = sqrt(-1). - _Colin Barker_, Oct 15 2015
maple: f := x -> (1+x^3)/((1-x^2)*(1-x^4)): seq(coeff(series(f(x), x, n+1), x, n), n=0..64);a := n -> floor(n/4) + ((n mod 2 + 1 - floor((n mod 4)/3)) mod 2): seq(a(n), n=0..64); # _Johannes W. Meijer_, Oct 08 2013
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 + x^3) / (1 - x^2) / (1 - x^4), {x, 0, 70}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 15 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Replaced x^2 three times with x in the generating function (un-aerated). - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 23 2008
